Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the joint commission on public integrity to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists and requiring lobbyists to complete the course annually
Summary: Authorizes the joint commission on public ethics to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists; requires lobbyists to complete the course annually.
LawCode: Amd §1-d, rel §§1-u & 1-v to be §§1-x & 1-y, add §1-u, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to authorizing the joint commission on public integrity to provide a training course concerning anti-sexual harassment training for lobbyists and requiring lobbyists to complete the course annually
